Posts.Content: Dec 1, 2017 08:44PM gkbuser wrote: kathy, bless your heart. Yes, i was a stage 1, neg nodes and low onc score and yes I worry sometimes. Looking at the statistics they are very much in our favor! I met a 23 year breast cancer survivor and she attributed it to her faith in God and her positive attitude. She told herself she was healed! I want to be like her. Yes, I have emotional setbacks when I read stuff but I try hard to get back to positive thinking.tell yourelf you are cured! I am a year out from surgery and 9 months out from radiation. I find the anxiety getting better with time and I hope you will too.
Posts.Title: Stage 1 and struggling KathyL624 gkbuser
